title: (4323) Architect Designed New Luxury 2 Storied House for Sale, Pelawatha
details: Architect Designed New Luxury 2 Storied House for Sale, Pelawatha, 4 Bed Rooms With A/C, CCTV Camera, 3 Bathrooms, Pantry, Separate Servants Room and Bath Room, Roller Gate, Landscaped, Front/rear Garden, 3600 sq.ft, Rs: 390 (Negotiable) 39 Million
